decision_conditions:
Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting that Order) no part(s) of the roof of the building(s) hereby approved shall be used as a balcony or terrace nor shall any access be formed thereto.
REASON: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining property.
description: Single storey rear extension to replace existing conservatory.  Hip to gable rear roof extensions: (Variation of planning approval 23/1332/HOT to allow for continuation of the rear parapet alongside the side (South) elevation to improve the traditional aesthetics and characteristics of the side of the extension.  Window positions and heights to South Elevation of extension marginally changed.  Change of flat skylight to pyramidal similar to neighbouring rooflights, and minor changes to other rooflights siting. Existing fence height corrected and trellis proposed).
